channel.title: [PI]Can't Connect Server/Other's Can't Connect - Feel like giving up, PAYING
channel.description:
Really feel like giving up, I've been at this for 12 hours now.
Used the normal client - others can't connect because of loading problems Downloaded new clients - error connecting even though i changed all ports/ip
Really not in the mood for this bs anymore, someone else just scammed me aswell for $10 as they said they would help me.
I really need help - Add me on Skype - Deathly_Wish - Stirling/Hamza
Paying through paypal
